title: Haiti Gas-Truck Blast Kills at Least 62 People in Latest Disaster for Nation
sub_head: Officials say dozens more were wounded by the explosion in Cap-Haïtien and that the death toll is likely to rise
body:
A tanker truck carrying gasoline exploded in Haiti’s second-largest city of Cap-Haïtien, killing at least 62 people and injuring dozens more, Haitian officials said Tuesday.
It was the latest in a string of recent disasters to hit the hemisphere’s poorest nation that include a presidential assassination, a devastating earthquake and mass kidnappings.
